description: This script retrieves and validates an account ID by checking system configurations, fallback mechanisms, and ensuring the ID contains only allowed characters and falls within a certain length.

methods.name: echo_time
methods.description: Prints the current date/time along with a message indicating the source of the call.

methods.name: check_accountid
methods.description: Validates the account ID to ensure it is alphanumeric, within length limits, and does not contain special characters. Logs success or failure.

methods.name: getAccountId
methods.description: Retrieves the account ID from system configuration or fallback methods, then validates it.
